ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Wooden Crook
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, I m surprised that everyone else didn t jump on this, but being friday, I suppose your all out scheming your way out of work early to go play EQ.... Bard
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, I'm surprised that everyone else didn't jump on
this, but being friday, I suppose your all out
scheming your way out of work early to go play EQ....

Bard have the 2hd slash and blunt skill listed, but
cannot raise it past one (1). The reason being in
beta there was a debate on wheater to give us two
handed weapons or dual wield to raise our melee
ability. As I'm sure you know, we have dual wield.
However, the 2hd skills where never removed from our
guild.
